column4: I have ubuntu 9.04 installed with wubi installer, and I only invested 8 gigs. How would I give it more space? I recently got some help, but I want to see if there is a way I can do it without reinstalling. Anyone know how? I need the space
someone please help, I need the extra space.
I mean, I only put 8 gigs into ubuntu
And I want to put more space
Do you know how I can add more?
are you thinking to re-edit partitions?
